oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Banner Banquet of Champions, Nashville, Tennessee, 1956 January 31
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pictured: Johnny Majors (center at banquet table with floral arrangements) with Tennessee Governor Frank Clement, left, and unidentified man on right. Majors won the Player of the Year Award at the Banner Banquet of Champions. The Banner newspaper hosted this annual event to honor sports achievement. Forms part of Record Group 412, Photographs Collection. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Majors, Johnny, 1935- ; Clement, Frank G., 1949-
